Name: Harshit singh

Name: Abhishek kumar
College: University Institute of Engineering and Technology - [UIET]

Many teachers are Ph.D. holders and many are contract based as well. Experienced teachers have good subject knowledge and some contract-based teachers do not have good knowledge. The teaching method is the same as classroom based. Whiteboards are used. Still, assignments and files are submitted in printed format i.e. need to submit offline. There are end-semester exams every semester and three sessional(mid-term) exams, from there three, two are compulsory to take. It's not much difficult to pass the exam.

Name: Appan Das
Heading: An Overall View of NIT JAMSHEDPUR

The annual fest is called the CULFEST which is held in the month of April while the tech fest is OJASS which is held in March. The library consists of full of different kinds of books and novels. Any student can just borrow books for a certain time period with the help of their library card. The classroom has both black and white boards along with the projectors. It contains a centralised AC system which is a relief for students in the summer season. Besides the AC system, there are a number of fans fitted along the walls in the classroom. There is also a provision for the mic on the professor's desk so that the sound could be heard by the students sitting on the last benches. Almost every sport is played and every sport has its own club which students can take part in like football, cricket, volleyball etc. There are a number of clubs in which students can take part in the first year like Quinite, Faces, and technical clubs.
